home.title: Chao mung den Adventure Park
home.content:
Adventure Park la khu vui choi giai tri hang dau Viet Nam, mang den trai nghiem tuyet voi cho moi lua tuoi.

Voi hon 50 tro choi va diem tham quan, chung toi tu hao phuc vu hang trieu luot khach moi nam.

Kham pha the gioi ky dieu tai Adventure Park - Noi moi giac mo thanh su that!

about.title: Gioi Thieu Adventure Park
about.content:
Thanh lap nam 2010, Adventure Park la mot trong nhung khu vui choi giai tri lon nhat Viet Nam voi dien tich 50 hecta.

Chung toi so huu hon 50 tro choi hien dai, 10 khu vuc chu de doc dao, va hang chuc diem check-in dep nhu mo.

Voi tam nhin tro thanh diem den hang dau Dong Nam A, chung toi khong ngung dau tu vao cong nghe va dich vu de mang lai trai nghiem tot nhat cho du khach.

Hai niem gia tri cot loi:
- An toan la tren het
- Niem vui cho moi lua tuoi
- Dich vu chuyen nghiep
- Bao ve moi truong

attractions-thrill.title: Khu Tro Choi Cam Giac Manh

items.name: Thunder Coaster
items.fullDesc: Thunder Coaster la tau luon cao nhat va nhanh nhat Viet Nam. Voi do cao 60m va toc do toi da 120km/h, ban se trai nghiem cam giac roi tu do va nhung cu xoay 360 do.

items.name: Sky Drop Tower
items.fullDesc: Sky Drop Tower mang den cam giac roi tu do tu do cao 80m. Tim ban se dung lai trong giay lat truoc khi roi xuong voi toc do chong mat.

items.name: Wild Rapids
items.fullDesc: Cheo thuyen vuot thac voi hanh trinh 500m qua nhung gheng thac hung vi. Chuan bi bi uot nhep va day cam xuc!

items.name: Giant Ferris Wheel
items.fullDesc: Vong quay cao 100m, mot trong nhung vong quay lon nhat Dong Nam A. Tu tren cao, ban co the ngam toan canh thanh pho tuyet dep.

items.name: Royal Carousel
items.fullDesc: Vong xoay ngua theo phong cach co dien Chau Au voi 48 chu ngua duoc cham khac tinh xao. Am nhac ky ao hoa quyen vao anh sang lung linh.

items.name: Bumper Cars Arena
items.fullDesc: San xe dien dam va voi 30 chiec xe day mau sac. Thi dau vui ve cung gia dinh va ban be!

items.name: Mini World
items.shortDesc: The gioi thu nho cho be
items.fullDesc: The gioi thu nho voi cac mo hinh thanh pho, nong trai, va bien ca. Tre em co the choi tro choi nha nha, lam bac si, dau bep...

items.name: Splash Pad
items.shortDesc: Khu vui choi nuoc tre em
items.fullDesc: Khu vui choi nuoc voi voi phun, thac nuoc mini va nhieu tro choi nuoc an toan cho tre nho. Nuoc duoc loc va khu trung hang ngay.

items.name: VR Adventure Zone
items.fullDesc: Khu vuc thuc te ao voi 20 tro choi VR hien dai nhat. Tu nhay du, leo nui den chien dau voi quai vat - tat ca trong the gioi ao sieu thuc.

items.name: AR Treasure Quest
items.shortDesc: San tim kho bau cong nghe AR
items.fullDesc: Su dung dien thoai hoac kinh AR de tim kho bau an giau khap cong vien. Thu thap diem va doi qua hap dan!

items.name: Botanical Garden
items.fullDesc: Vuon thuc vat voi hon 500 loai cay nhiet doi tu khap the gioi. Con duong dao bo quanh co uon khuc trong khong gian xanh mat.

items.name: Butterfly Paradise
items.fullDesc: Vuon buom trong nha voi hon 100 loai buom dep mat tu Viet Nam va cac nuoc. Khong gian lung linh ky ao.

items.name: Heritage Village
items.shortDesc: Lang nghe truyen thong Viet Nam
items.fullDesc: Tai hien cuoc song lang que Viet Nam xua voi nha co, dinh lang va cac nghe truyen thong. Trai nghiem lam gom, det vai, va thuong thuc am thuc dan gian.

items.name: Main Show Stage
items.fullDesc: San khau chinh voi suc chua 2000 nguoi. Hang ngay co cac chuong trinh ca nhac, mua, va ao thuat dac sac.

items.name: Water & Light Show
items.fullDesc: Show nhac nuoc voi he thong phun nuoc cao 50m, anh sang laser va nhac song. Diem nhan hap dan moi toi tai Adventure Park.

items.name: Infinity Mirror Room
items.fullDesc: Khong gian guong vo cuc ky ao voi hang ngan anh sang LED. Dia diem check-in hot nhat mang xa hoi!

items.name: Sky Glass Bridge
items.fullDesc: Cau kinh trong suot cao 50m uon luon giua nhung ngon cay. View ngoan muc va cam giac mao hiem nhe.

items.name: Science Discovery Center
items.shortDesc: Trung tam khoa hoc tuong tac
items.fullDesc: Hon 50 thi nghiem khoa hoc tuong tac cho tre em va nguoi lon. Tu vat ly, hoa hoc den thien van hoc - hoc ma choi!

items.name: Ban Do Toan Khu
items.fullDesc: Ban do tuong tac toan bo khu vui choi voi tat ca cac diem tham quan, nha hang, va tien ich.

items.name: Ban Do Theo Khu Vuc
items.fullDesc: Chia theo 10 khu vuc chu de: Cam giac manh, Gia dinh, Tre em, Thien nhien...

items.name: Ban Do Theo Do Tuoi
items.shortDesc: Tro choi phu hop tung do tuoi
items.fullDesc: Tim tro choi phu hop cho: Be 2-5 tuoi, Tre 6-12 tuoi, Thieu nien 13-17, Nguoi lon.

items.name: Tim Diem Gan Nhat
items.fullDesc: Tim nhanh cac tien ich gan vi tri cua ban: Nha ve sinh, Quan an, Tram y te, ATM, Cho do...

items.name: Ve Nguoi Lon
items.fullDesc: Ve vao cong danh cho nguoi lon tu 14 tuoi tro len. Trai nghiem tron ven tat ca cac tro choi va khu vuc.
includes: Vao cua tat ca khu vuc

items.name: Ve Tre Em
items.fullDesc: Ve uu dai danh cho tre em tu 4-13 tuoi. Tre duoi 4 tuoi mien phi.
includes: Vao cua tat ca khu vuc
Khu tre em khong gioi han

items.name: Ve Gia Dinh
items.fullDesc: Goi ve tiet kiem cho gia dinh 4 nguoi (2 nguoi lon + 2 tre em). Tiet kiem 20% so voi mua le.

items.name: Ve Combo VIP
items.fullDesc: Goi VIP tron ven voi ve vao cua, bua trua buffet, va nhieu uu dai dac biet.

items.name: Danh Sach Tro Choi
items.fullDesc: Danh sach day du cac tro choi tai Adventure Park voi thong tin chi tiet ve do tuoi, thoi gian va muc do.

items.name: Show Bieu Dien Hang Ngay
items.fullDesc: Lich trinh cac show bieu dien hang ngay tai Adventure Park.

subItems.name: 16:00 - Character Meet
subItems.desc: Gap go nhan vat hoat hinh

items.name: Su Kien Theo Mua
items.shortDesc: Festival va le hoi dac biet
items.fullDesc: Cac su kien lon theo mua tai Adventure Park.

subItems.name: Summer Splash
subItems.desc: Thang 6-8 - Le hoi nuoc mua he

items.name: Workshop & Hoat Dong
items.shortDesc: Lop hoc va hoat dong nhom
items.fullDesc: Cac workshop thu cong va hoat dong nhom moi ngay.

items.name: Nha Hang
items.fullDesc: Cac nha hang phuc vu mon an da dang tu Viet Nam den quoc te.

subItems.name: Dragon Palace
subItems.desc: Am thuc Trung Hoa | A la carte

subItems.name: Saigon Kitchen
subItems.desc: Mon Viet truyen thong | Set menu

items.name: Quan An Nhanh
items.fullDesc: Cac quay thuc an nhanh phan bo khap cong vien.

items.name: Ca Phe & Giai Khat
items.fullDesc: Quan ca phe va khu nghi chan thoang mat.

items.name: Cua Hang Luu Niem
items.fullDesc: Cac cua hang ban do luu niem va qua tang doc dao.

subItems.name: Main Gift Shop
subItems.desc: Cong chinh - Do luu niem chinh hang

items.name: Thue Xe & Phuong Tien
items.shortDesc: Xe dien, xe day tre em
items.fullDesc: Dich vu cho thue phuong tien di chuyen trong cong vien.

items.name: Tu Giu Do
items.fullDesc: He thong tu giu do hien dai tai nhieu vi tri trong cong vien.

items.name: Dich Vu Y Te
items.fullDesc: Tram y te voi bac si va y ta truc san sang ho tro 24/7. Mien phi so cuu va thuoc co ban.

items.name: Ho Tro Nguoi Khuyet Tat
items.shortDesc: Tien ich cho nguoi khuyet tat
items.fullDesc: Adventure Park cam ket ho tro toi da cho nguoi khuyet tat voi nhieu tien ich dac biet.

items.name: Lost & Found
items.fullDesc: Quay tiep nhan va tra lai do that lac. Lien he ngay neu ban bi mat do.

items.name: Gio Mo Cua
items.fullDesc: Thong tin gio hoat dong cua Adventure Park.

items.name: Noi Quy
items.fullDesc: Vui long doc ky noi quy truoc khi tham quan de dam bao an toan va trai nghiem tot nhat.

subItems.name: An toan
subItems.desc: Tuan thu chi dan nhan vien

subItems.name: Do tuoi
subItems.desc: Tre em duoi 14 phai co nguoi lon di kem

subItems.name: Thuc pham
subItems.desc: Khong mang do an tu ben ngoai

subItems.name: Thu cung
subItems.desc: Khong mang thu cung vao khu vui choi

subItems.name: Hut thuoc
subItems.desc: Chi hut thuoc tai khu vuc quy dinh

items.name: Huong Dan Tham Quan
items.fullDesc: Nhung meo huu ich de co chuyen tham quan tron ven.

subItems.name: Den som
subItems.desc: Nen den truoc 9:00 de tranh dong

subItems.name: Ung dung
subItems.desc: Tai app de xem ban do va xep hang

subItems.name: Trang phuc
subItems.desc: Mac do thoai mai, mang giay the thao

contact.title: Lien He
contact.content:
ADVENTURE PARK

Dia chi: 123 Duong Vui Choi, Quan 7, TP.HCM

Hotline: 1900 1234
Email: info@adventurepark.vn
Website: www.adventurepark.vn

Gio lam viec:
Thu 2 - Chu Nhat: 8:00 - 21:00

Ket noi voi chung toi:
Facebook: /adventureparkVN
Instagram: @adventurepark_vn
Youtube: Adventure Park Vietnam

items.name: Nhan Vien Van Hanh
items.fullDesc: Tuyen nhan vien van hanh tro choi, dam bao an toan va huong dan khach tham quan.
benefits: Ve mien phi cho gia dinh

items.name: Dien Vien & MC
items.fullDesc: Tim kiem cac tai nang bieu dien cho cac show hang ngay va su kien dac biet.
requirements: Kinh nghiem MC la loi the

items.name: Nhan Vien F&B
items.fullDesc: Tuyen nhan vien phuc vu, pha che va bep cho cac nha hang trong cong vien.

items.name: The Thanh Vien
items.fullDesc: Dang ky the thanh vien de huong uu dai 20% gia ve va nhieu quyen loi dac biet.

items.name: Uu Dai Sinh Nhat
items.shortDesc: Mien phi ve trong thang sinh nhat
items.fullDesc: Thanh vien duoc mien phi ve vao cua trong thang sinh nhat va giam 50% cho nguoi di cung.
includes: Ve mien phi cho thanh vien
Giam 50% cho nguoi di cung (toi da 3)

items.name: Uu Dai Nhom
items.shortDesc: Giam gia cho doan tu 10 nguoi
items.fullDesc: Chuong trinh uu dai dac biet cho cac doan, truong hoc va cong ty.

items.name: Chuong Trinh Khach Quen
items.fullDesc: Moi lan tham quan tich diem de doi ve mien phi va qua tang hap dan.

items.name: Album Anh
items.shortDesc: Hinh anh dep nhat Adventure Park
items.fullDesc: Bo suu tap hinh anh cac khu vuc va hoat dong tai Adventure Park.

items.name: Video
items.fullDesc: Xem cac video gioi thieu, highlight su kien va behind the scenes tai Adventure Park.

items.name: Anh Khach Tham Quan
items.fullDesc: Nhung khoanh khac dep cua khach tham quan. Chia se anh voi hashtag #AdventureParkVN

items.name: Bao Chi & Truyen Thong
items.fullDesc: Cac bai viet, phong su va hinh anh tu bao chi ve Adventure Park.
